title: 7 meaningful gifts to give your partner this Diwali
text: Do you know what’s the best part about Diwali? It’s gifting! We aren’t just talking about receiving gifts, but also about buying gifts. The excitement you feel knowing how your partner might smile looking at the gift: something that he had said in the passing and you somehow managed to pick up on the cues. But for some, buying gifts might not be this easy. And then there is this myth that buying gifts for men is tough. Well, we are here to help you bust these myths and buy the perfect gift for your partner this Diwali.
description: A gifting guide for all those who are looking for last minute gifting options for their partner for Diwali
